short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export all contacts from any group in a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to download contacts from any WhatsApp Group with a single click.

- Phone numbers are downloaded as a CSV file.
- CSV file will be saved on your computer with the same name as the group.

LIMITATIONS:
This extension only downloads phone numbers that doesn't exist on your contacts list.

---
IMPORTANT:
The contacts list is stored on your computer only, it's never sent anywhere else. Everything is handled locally on your browser.
---
